examples.text: tasks of such repetitive and numbing dullness
a desert of unremitting flatness and dullness

definitions: lack of brightness, vividness, or sheen

examples.text: flowery options to brighten up the dullness of autumn
the summer light cut into the dullness of the room

definitions: the quality of being slow to understand; stupidity

examples.text: critical comments on the stupidity or dullness of those in authority

shortDefinitions: quality of being slow to understand

definitions: the quality of not perceiving things distinctly

examples.text: you might notice mental dullness that feels like a hangover
70 percent of clubbers suffer dullness of hearing or ringing in the ears

shortDefinitions: quality of not perceiving things distinctly
